screen_desc: The screenshot displays a smartphone home screen with a pink background. The screen shows the date "Wed, Dec 14" at the top. Below the date, there are five app icons aligned horizontally, including the phone, messages, Google Photos, Chrome, and YouTube apps. At the bottom, there is a Google search bar with a microphone icon for voice search. The screen also features a dock with a battery icon, signal strength, Wi-Fi, and other icons at the top.
action_think: To clear all items from the cart on Best Buy, I need to navigate to the Best Buy app and then open the cart page.
action_result: By clicking on the Google Chrome app, you have opened the browser. This is necessary to proceed to the Best Buy website where you can clear the items from your cart.
